navbar.title: Next OR Solver
navbar.description: An online tool for solving operations research problems

solution_paper.primal_unlimited_or_unsolvable: Problem is primal unlimited or not solvable

footer.about_nors_text: The Next OR Solver provides a user-friendly platform for solving optimization problems. With the help of the HiGHS and GLPK solvers, both specific and general models can be solved efficiently. The following formats are available for entering optimization problems: GMPL, CPLEX LP, and our intuitive EASY UI, which is based on GMPL. Models can be exported and imported in various formats. This project was developed by four students at the Osnabr√ºck University of Applied Sciences as part of the Programming Project module, with the aim of creating an easy way to solve complex optimization problems.
